metadata.name: Captain Beto’s Fiberglass Ship
metadata.description:
The concept behind this collection was to create a series of space-bars based on different musical genres, as an excuse to experiment with different shapes, colors and sounds.

The first one is perhaps the most precarious, but it’s also the most special as it’s inspired by a beautiful song from Spinetta, an amazing artist from another galaxy we were blessed to have in Argentina for a short time, but whose melodies will resonate forever in cosmos.

✦ Captain Beto’s Fiberglass Ship ✦ 
A rest station for errant aliens, floating forever in the ether :)

File info: MP4 video / 2880 x 2158 px
Original design and animation by Juan Casini
Music: Fourzy Lofi by Juan Casini
From Space Cantina OST / Original Music for Aliens

Tags: illustration, animation, music, space, spaceship, galaxy, cosmos, sci-fi, first, debut
